content: this little dude is the inevitable result of a full-force return of my childhood obsession with dragons and the fact that i was traveling he stands quite nicely if his legs are stuffed well and the wings can be floppy or stiff if the arm is stuffed if you would like you can add wire but i am not able to provide instructions for that approximately 16 in long 40 5 cm 12 in 30 5 cm wingspan and 4 in 10 cm tall i did entirely forget about gauge and yardage so i do apologize for not having those any feedback on how the pattern is written and organized is greatly appreciated as this is the first time i ve written a pattern for people that aren t me
